009package Ch21_Geometric_Operations;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
013import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
014import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
015import imagingbook.common.geometry.mappings.linear.AffineMapping2D;
016import imagingbook.common.geometry.mappings.linear.Rotation2D;
017import imagingbook.common.geometry.mappings.linear.Translation2D;
018import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
019import imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils;
020import imagingbook.common.image.ImageMapper;
021import imagingbook.common.image.OutOfBoundsStrategy;
022import imagingbook.common.image.interpolation.InterpolationMethod;
023import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
024
025/**
026 * <p>
027 * ImageJ plugin, rotates the current image by a specified angle around its center. See Sec. 21.1.1 of [1] for details.
028 * Optionally opens a sample image if no image is currently open.
029 * </p>
030 * <p>
031 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer
032 * (2022).
033 * </p>
034 *
035 * @author WB
036 * @version 2022/11/28
037 * @see ImageMapper
038 * @see Rotation2D
039 */
040public class Map_Rotate_Center implements PlugInFilter {
041        
042        private static double alphaDeg = 15.0;  // rotation angle (in degrees)
043        
044        private static OutOfBoundsStrategy OBS = OutOfBoundsStrategy.ZeroValues;
045        private static InterpolationMethod IPM = InterpolationMethod.Bicubic;
046        
047        /**
048         * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image
049         * is currently open.
050         */
051        public Map_Rotate_Center() {
052                if (IjUtils.noCurrentImage()) {
053                        DialogUtils.askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.Clown);
054                }
055        }
056
057        @Override
058    public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
059        return DOES_ALL;
060    }
061
062        @Override
063    public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
064                
065                if (!runDialog()) {
066                        return;
067                }
068                
069                double alpha =  Math.toRadians(alphaDeg);
070                double xc = 0.5 * ip.getWidth();
071                double yc = 0.5 * ip.getHeight();
072                
073                AffineMapping2D T1 = new Translation2D(-xc, -yc);
074                AffineMapping2D R  = new Rotation2D(alpha);
075                AffineMapping2D T2 = new Translation2D(xc, yc);
076                AffineMapping2D A  = T1.concat(R).concat(T2);
077                
078                AffineMapping2D iA = A.getInverse();    // inverse mapping (target to source)
079                new ImageMapper(iA, OBS, IPM).map(ip);
080    }
081        
082        // --------------------------------------------
083        
084        private boolean runDialog() {
085                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
086                
087                gd.addNumericField("Rotation angle (deg)", alphaDeg, 1);
088                gd.addEnumChoice("Image out-of-bounds strategy", OBS);
089                gd.addEnumChoice("Pixel interpolation method", IPM);
090                
091                gd.showDialog();
092                if (gd.wasCanceled())
093                        return false;
094                
095                alphaDeg = gd.getNextNumber();
096                OBS = gd.getNextEnumChoice(OutOfBoundsStrategy.class);
097                IPM = gd.getNextEnumChoice(InterpolationMethod.class);
098                
099                return true;
100        }
101}
